<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flourish and Ruin](/Feats.aspx?ID=4510) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 69 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes. You can cast [field of life](/Spells.aspx?ID=114) and [tangling creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331) as 6th-rank primal [innate spells](/Rules.aspx?ID=279) once per day each.
name: Flourish and Ruin
